short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Makes your NewTab page a bit more funky.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This amazing web plugin replaces your new tab screen with a more funky and stylish page, including half of the screen being designated to Mark Zuckerburg to remind you he's always watching.

Also it has like a clock and notepad thing but that's less important than Marky-Boy.

/Base Code by Daniel Eden, on chrome store & github as Lucid
/Complete Redesign & custom remake by Alfie Ranstead
/If you want to make your own redesign go to https://github.com/Lucid-/Toys/chrome-lucid and git clone it, then go Wild!
/alternatively you can git clone my code and do to it as you please
